title: Ichiban Ushiro no Daimaou
alternative_title: Demon King Daimao, いちばんうしろの大魔王
description: Sai Akuto aims to become part of his country's highest order of magicians and contribute to society as one of its clergy. On the day he is admitted into the Constan Magical Academy, his aptitude test predicts the following though: "Future Occupation ... Devil King". Thus begins his difficult school life in which he is resented by the combative female class head, Hattori Junko, desired by a girl with mysterious powers, Soga Keena, and guarded by a beautiful female android, Korone.
